mapper.delete: delete from team_player where player_id=#{playerId} and team_id=#{teamId}
mapper.insert: insert into team_player (player_id, team_id, create_time, agreed) values (#{playerId}, #{teamId}, now(), #{agreed})
mapper.update: update team_player set agreed=true where team_id=#{teamId} and player_id=#{playerId}
